comments:
on 0219N, after generating the ejb-jar.xml, I am not able to load it in the xml
editor.  This leads me to believe something is going wrong or is not set up
properly.  This was with just one default annotated session bean.

I'm re-opening, since Naci has said he's seen, now, too. 
Initial investigation implies there's a threading problem, which causes and
exception, and this leaves things in a bad state so can't be re-opened.

Created an attachment (id=18240)
quick patch to guard against initial NPE

Created an attachment (id=18243)
a "devopment build" of effected jar, for quick testing

this jar would should replace (the renamed) editor.jar in o.e.w.sse.ui

I suspect there's other errors going on here, but would appreciate some testing

with this quick fix to see if it avoids the "bad state" problem that prevents
editor from opening.

I've committed to head and will release for next I-build, since complete safe fix, 
but won't close until confimed fixed, or we can better reproduce the problem.

I've received word that the patch "seems to fix it" so will close for now. 
Please re-open if see again. We should develop unit tests to "stress test" 
the annotation framework to make sure all is working well.
